plot: A village cricket team plays its last match before most of its players go off to fight in World War I, confident that "it will all be over by Christmas".
title: 1914 All Out
plot_es: A village cricket team plays its last match before most of its players go off to fight in World War I, confident that "it will all be over by Christmas".
plot_en: A village cricket team plays its last match before most of its players go off to fight in World War I, confident that "it will all be over by Christmas".
